name: Learn to Write the Alphabet - Kids -
description: Give your child a head start in learning to write the Alphabet , with this free app.  New features , since last update! You have asked for these features and we have done them! Hand writing recognition , get a star when writing a letter correctly (Not always 100% accurate, but catches letters most of the time) Pass each letter after getting 5 stars Stars are remembered for each letter so you can see which letters still need to be practiced and learnt  Delete stars of previously passed letters. Main features Uppercase and lowercase letter writing in free hand Line guides for help in writing Stoke order help and guidance Cute graphics and animations for kids. Letters are spoken aloud  More features coming in updates soon. Learning to write the Alphabet is the ideal age for primary school children learning to write the Alphabet , knowing the alphabet and easy and a fun way to learn calligraphy education in their application. The calligraphy is not a game but your children will learn to write in an entertaining and interactive way to learn to write .  - Vocabulary: Learn how to write the different animals , Learning to write the Alphabet (soon ) Learn how to draw shapes (soon ) Learn how to write the different animals , etc.  Thanks in advance team C & C - Carrion Castillo
